grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 隔月【カクゲツ】every second month, every other month
遠隔【エンカク】distant, remote, isolated
kun reading compounds: 隔てる【へだてる】to separate (by distance, time, etc.), to isolate, to partition, to divide, to interpose, to have between, to alienate, to estrange
隔たる【へだたる】to be distant
